title: 9-Patch Splash Screen App
tooltip: This sample application demonstrates how to use 9-patch PNG images for Android* splash screens within Intel XDK. . It uses the Apache Cordova* Splash Screen and In App Browser plugins.
description: This sample application demonstrates how to use 9-patch PNG images for Android* splash screens within Intel XDK. . It uses the Apache Cordova* Splash Screen and In App Browser plugins.
